features: Upgraded Larger Capacity Battery: The neck fan has 6000mAh Capacity Battery and lasts 6-20 hours depending on speeds, but other neck fans only has 4000mah or less. Quick and easy Type-C output rechargeable fan.

24 ft/s Air Flow Coverage: The portable neck fan features exclusive air duct combines with a supercharged electric motor, generating a high-velocity airflow at up to 24 ft/s, making you fully refreshed from neck to face with immersive. The bladeless neck fan won't jam your hair.
Unique Ergonomic Design: The blast personal fan adopts a specialized arc shape design that will stay on your neck stably while others will drop easily.

Lower Noise & 3 Speed: Aligning algorithmic impeller design with modified motor, the neck fan produces extremely low noise, making you enjoy quieter-than-a-whisper cooling. 3 speed settings meet different personal needs.

Perfect Customer Service: The wearable fan is suitable for all age men, women, teenagers and kids. If you have any questions about our products, we will solve it within 24 hrs. This portable personal fan comes with 365-days warranty.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Delmac Summer Magic Cooling Device Breeze is refreshing, Enjoy through heat, Instant hot flashes relief, Make your day a bit Cooler! Are you worry about the hot flashes of the searing summer?Are you still annoyed by the sweating neck when doing workout, attending festivals, sunbathing, vacation, watching ballgames, clubbing, having adventures? So what are you waiting for? Our neck fan can solve all problems above,cool you down in 3 seconds and help you get most out of fun, explore the world, enjoy life and more. Treat for yourself / Great Gifts Ideas Get yourself this must have on the go accessory now.Perfect for unexpected surprise gifts for your beloved elder ones, kids, family, friends!

3 Hours Charging | 6-20 Hours of Cool Upgraded larger battery capacity: 6,000 mAh, which can last Longer Running Hrs: 6 - 20 hrs depending on the airflow settings you choose.Equipped with USB-C charging port makes charging 2 times faster, making you experience up to 20 hours of cool air with just 3 hours charging. Low Noise Latest dual turbo of blade fans, noise-canceling electric motor, and One-piece air duct design have been applied in this personal fan to reduce noise. This technology produces stronger airflow and lower sound, which makes you cool off faster and won't be disturbed by noise. Acceptable sound and relatively quiet. Upgraded Turbine The exclusive air duct system combines with the upgraded Turbine, the portable neck fan can produce high-speed airflow, making you cool in 3 seconds.

3 Times Stronger Airflow Large air outlets with less barriers produces 3 times stronger volume of Airflow than other neck fans, delivering high-speed, brisk cool. Human Body Curve Design The arc shape of the neck fan is designed according to human body curve, making the personal neck fan will not drop off. Metal plate Design The metal plate on the middle part can give you an instant ice feeling, but it has no Refrigeration function!

Fashionable Comfort. Extremely Safe. 3 Switchable Settings Fashionable Comfort: Wearing a pair of headphone design bladeless neck fan around your neck is not only hands free but also seems fashionable. Extremely Safe: Bladeless neck fan is very safe, just hang the small personal fan around your neck, no need to worry about hair getting caught or accidental contact, kids, men, women anyone can use it with confidence. 3 Switchable Settings: Easily switchable by clicking button 1-4 times according to personal needs. You will feel 3 level airflow blowing out from those air outlets

Package list: 1 x Personal Neck Fan1 x USB-C Cable1 x User Manual Product Details: Product Model: F68Product Name: Bladeless Hanging Neck FanProduct Weight: 13.05 ozProduct Size: 8.27″ x 9.06″ x *3.23″Battery Capacity: 6,000 mAhInput Power: 5V 1ASettings: 3 SettingsWorking Hours: 6-20 hours (depending on different settings)

Use this cooling portable fan anywhere, anytime You will be surprised how powerful this little bladeless neck fan is, perfect for using at home and office, indoor and outdoor workout, festivals/concerts, sunbathing, vacation, ballgames, clubbing, commute on public transit, working outside, cooking, BBQ, Carnivals/ Theme Parks, outdoor adventures!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The Delmac Personal Portable Neck Fan has a 6000mAh Rechargeable battery that last me all day long. I spend most of my day outside in the sun working and the fan makes it bearable. I keep it on low and raise it to max when heat comes to get me. The fan is light weight and low noise. It does hit you in the face and can dry out contact lenses so wear sunglasses.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 13, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for my needs
reviews.reviewText: The black and orange one is the one I am writing the review on. I love it and use it all day while working. It's has good power, long battery life and is not uncomfortable. I work indoors cleaning houses. It doesn't matter how cool the air conditioning is I am still sweating. This has made a huge difference keeping me cool. It does not blow air in the back. But it blows hard enough that if I have it higher than the low setting it makes my eyes water. I purchased the smaller white one somewhere else and it just doesn't compare even taking in to account it blows in the back. One thing to keep in mind, it just blows air. If you are outside in the heat then it blows hot air. If you are inside in air conditioning then it blows cool air. Meets my needs perfectly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars The fan fits a large neck
reviews.reviewText: I use this fan for work! Love the battery life! The fan fits a large neck, I’m smaller so it actually falls forward on me… it does also pull hair. Wish it fit better around my neck, and I wish the vent holes were around the back!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I was pleasantly surprised with the performance of this item. It isn't very heavy which was one of my concerns. The noise level is low and the air flow is very good. While doing yard work, I would take a water/rest break and use it then. With 100+ degrees, the breeze was very refreshing!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I received it today and was able to charge it fully before going into work this afternoon. I used it for about two hours on low speed and it stayed running the whole time. I like the shape as it sits well without just trying to fall off. I also like the blue color it is nice. I only used it on level 1 today and it was quiet while providing a nice breeze.On the downside it does not have a digital display or even lights to tell you how much charge is left. There is one light that is red when it is charging and green when it is full. The paperwork with it also said you need to be careful not to over charge it so just plugging it in overnight or otherwise taking your eye off of it while charging is probably not a good idea. It has a metal plate at the back of the neck simulating a cooling plate, but this model does not offer that feature unfortunately. The vents do not go all the way aroundIn the display photo it looked like it would but it is purely decorative. Otherwise, it is light and worked well for me today. I will test it more tomorrow and would like to do a run time test to see if it will really last as long as is claimed. The higher power battery vs cost is the main reason I picked this one instead of what I really wanted.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Definitely worth the money.
reviews.reviewText: Was actually a Christmas gift everyone liked. Good air flow. Good for hot offices, hiking, etc.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I am a house cleaner and use this daily. I tried out 6 different brands and this one is the best. Lightweight, comfortable, quiet. Does not interfere with house cleaning. Easily lasts 5 hrs. on low speed. Highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Works but could be better
reviews.reviewText: This product is bigger than I thought it would be. I was planning to keep it because it does a good job of providing me with some cool air but after using it for about a week, it started shutting off on me. I charged it up over night the first time shut off on me thinking it was an issue with the charge but when I used it again the next day with in a few minutes it did the same thing. It's not as quiet as I would like for it to but, but it's a fan, it's going to make some noise. Besides the shutting off issue I like it.

reviews.reviewTitle: Fácil de usar y muy silencioso
reviews.reviewText: Es fácil de utilizar y cumple con lo que promete, el ruido del ventilador es bajo y eso lo hace cómodo de usar en el trabajo.

reviews.reviewTitle: Delmac Neck Fan (Shame on the Seller)
reviews.reviewText: Within 2 1/2 months of receiving the neck fan the charging mechanism stopped working. The company won’t refund or exchange it because of Amazon’s 30 day return policy. It was expensive, very disappointed.
